${ModID}:Vindicate.NAME: Vindicate
${ModID}:Vindicate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:DarkLance.NAME: Dark Lance
${ModID}:DarkLance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've changed Stances this turn, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:FuriousAssault.NAME: Furious Assault
${ModID}:FuriousAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Slam.NAME: Slam
${ModID}:Slam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.
